content.rendered:
Merck authorized product distributors

Below is a list of wholesalers and physician distributors that have met the requirements to be listed as a Merck Authorized Distributor (MAD).

  • ABO Pharmaceuticals
  • AmerisourceBergen Corporation
  • Anda
  • ASD Specialty Healthcare Inc.
  • Bell Medical Services
  • Besse Drug
  • Burlington Drug
  • Capital Wholesale Drug Co.
  • Cardinal Health
  • Clint Pharmaceuticals
  • CuraScript Specialty Distribution
  • Dakota Drug Inc.
  • Dealmed Medical Supplies, LLC
  • DMS Pharmaceutical Group
  • FFF Enterprises
  • Henry Schein
  • Lifeline Pharmaceuticals
  • Louisiana Wholesale
  • McKesson Drug
  • McKesson Medical Surgical Inc.
  • McKesson Plasma And Biologics
  • McKesson Specialty Distribution Services
  • Medico-Mart Inc.
  • Medline Industries Inc.
  • Med-Plus of NJ
  • Metro Medical Supply
  • Modern Medical Products
  • Morris & Dickson Co
  • NC Mutual
  • Oncology Supply
  • Pharmacy Buying Association, Inc.
  • Prescription Supply Inc.
  • R&S Northeast LLC
  • R. Weinstein Inc.
  • Rally Inc.
  • Reliance Wholesale, Inc.
  • Smith Drug Company
  • Value Drug
  • Vax Serve

Vaccine contracted distributors

Below is a list of Physician Distributors with which Merck Vaccines has a contractual agreement. The contents of this list are subject to change without notice.

Merck vaccines prime distributors

  • AndaMEDS (a division of Anda, Inc.)
  • Besse Medical
  • Henry Schein, Inc.
  • McKesson Medical-Surgical Inc.
  • Medico-Mart, Inc.
  • VaxServe, Inc

Other Merck vaccines distributors

  • ABO Pharmaceuticals
  • Bell Medical Services
  • Dealmed Medical Supplies, LLC
  • Medline Industries, Inc.
  • R. Weinstein, Inc.
  • Rally, Inc.
